title: How to Defragment Your Hard Drive in Command Prompt

steps.title: Click the Start Button and type in 'cmd.exe' into the search box.
steps.content: Click the Start Button and type in 'cmd.exe' into the search box.

steps.title: Right click on 'cmd.exe' and select the option 'Run as Administrator.'
steps.content: Right click on 'cmd.exe' and select the option 'Run as Administrator.'

steps.title: In the window that pops up, type 'defrag C:
steps.content: In the window that pops up, type 'defrag C: /U'

steps.title: Wait for the defragmentation to complete.
steps.content: Wait for the defragmentation to complete. This will take some time depending on how large and fragmented your disk is.
